### Clone
>
> #### use `sudo` if it requires write permissions
>
1. `git pull https://github.com/alphabit-technology/loopar-framework.git`
2. `cd loopar-framework`
3. `npm install`
4. `npm run dev`
5. Install Mysql Server in local or use remote server.
6. continue in your browser

### Installation Wizard
When clone is completed, you can run server and navigate in your browser, next the system show for you a wizard installation when you can define your DataBase conecction and continue, next you need define your project data, then your installation is completed.

Now you can to start a design your projects
